text:
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/data/use-graphql-data-in-your-website-pages#pass-dynamic-context-into-a-query> maybe?

According to this, you're missing quotes

fwiw this is replicable across portals <@U7SL518D6>

steps to recreate:

1. hard code global module on cms boilerplate `base.html` template
2. modify any text val in it _and publish_
3. search dev info on a published page for that text val
we should have a content.globals dict of this or something
